actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1332(a) (1) of title 28, United States Code, to reduce the jurisdiction of the U.S. district courts in actions between citizens of different States.

summary.text: Prohibits the bringing of a civil action in Federal district court on the basis of diversity of citizenship in any State of which a plaintiff is a citizen.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1332(a) (1) of title 28, United States Code, to reduce the jurisdiction of the U.S. district courts in actions between citizens of different States.
